urls.title: 'The disease is running rampant': Families at center of virus scare share their despair
urls.description: KIRKLAND, Wash. - Confusion, misinformation, apathetic officials, fear, panic, death ... Those are just some of the many hardships faced by families of residents at Life Care Center in Kirkland - the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak in the Puget Sound - as the disease sickens and kills off greater numbers of their loved ones each day. Meanwhile, the families say they wait for answers that never come, help that never arrives.
